src:
Timnas Indonesia U-19 Unggul Atas Timor Leste di Babak I
06 Nov 2019, 19:48 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi- Timnas Indonesia U-19 unggul atas Timor Leste di babak pertama. (ANTARA FOTO/Zabur Karuru)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Timnas Indonesia U-19 berhasil unggul 1-0 atas Timor LesteÂ pada babak pertama kualifikasi Piala Asia U-19 2020 di Stadion Madya, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11).Timnas Indonesia U-19 sudah unggul 1-0 saat pertandingan baru berjalan dua menit. Fajar Fathur Rahman merobek gawang Timor Leste setelah menerima umpan sepak pojok Beckham Putra.Setelah mencetak gol cepat, Timnas INdonesia U-19 terus berusaha mengurung pertahanan TImor Leste. Tim tamu sendiri coba mengancam lewat serangan balik.Di menit ke-15, Paulo Domingos Freitas melepaskan tendangan. Namun tendangan Freitas masih melenceng dari sasaran.Usaha Timnas Indonesia U-19 untuk menggempur pertahanan Timor Leste juga tidak berjalan mudah. Timor Leste melakukan pengawalan ketat pada pemain-pemain yang membawa bola.Di menit ke-22, kerjasama Bagus Kahfi dan Bagas Kaffa berujung pada umpan silang Bagas. Tetapi umpan silang Bagas tidak disambut oleh pemain Indonesia lainnya.Semenit berselang, Freitas terlepas dari jebakan offside. Melihat hal tersebut, kiper Ernando Ari bergerak cepat dan menangkap bola. Ernando sempat bertubrukan dengan Freitas yang tergelincir.Pada menit ke-29 Timnas Indonesia U-19 mendapatkan tendangan bebas karena Salman Alfarid dijatuhkan di muka kotak penalti. Rizky Ridho melepaskan tendangan mendatar yang berhasil ditepis oleh Junildo Manuel Pereira. Bola liar langsung disambut oleh tendangan keras Theo Fillo Numberi tetapi kembali digagalkan oleh Pereira.Pada 10 menit akhir babak pertama, upaya Indonesia untuk menekan Timor Leste terus gencar dilakukan. Meski alur serangan makin lancar, penyelesaian akhir Sutan Zico dan kawan-kawan belum memuaskan.Pada menit ke-40, Zico gagal memaksimalkan umpan panjang yang dilepaskan oleh Salman. Tendangan Zico melambung jauh di atas gawang.Di menit ke-45, giliran tendangan Bagus yang gagal berujung pada gol kedua karena bola melebar tipis di sebelah kanan gawang. Babak pertama berakhir dengan skor 1-0 untuk Timnas Indonesia U-19.Susunan pemainTimnas Indonesia U-19: Ernando Ari Sutaryadi; Amiruddin Bagas Kaffa, Rizky Ridho, Alfeandra Dewangga, M Salman Alfarid; Theo Fillo Numberi, David Maulana, Beckham Putra; Amiruddin Bagus Kahfi, Sutan Zico, M Fajar Fathur Rahman.Timor Leste: Junildo Manuel Pereira; Orcelio Nobelito Moises, Gumario Da Silva Moreira, Nelson Pinto Dos Reis; Jaimito Antonio Soares, Jhon Frith Ornai Liu, Paulo Domingos Freitas, Mouzinho De Lima, Expedito Soares Da Conceicao; Elias Joao Mesquita, Osorio Angelo Da Cos. (ptr)
text:
Indonesia U-19 national team is superior to Timor Leste in Round I
Nov 6 2019, 19:48 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration - Indonesian U-19 national team won over Timor Leste in the first round. (BETWEEN PHOTOS / Zabur Karuru)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Indonesian U-19 national team succeeded in winning 1-0 over Timor Leste in the first round of the U-19 Asian Cup 2020 qualification at the Madya Stadium, Jakarta, Wednesday (6/11). The Indonesian U-19 national team was superior 1 -0 when the game has been running for two minutes. Fajar Fathur Rahman tore East Timor's goal after receiving Beckham Putra's corner. After scoring quickly, the Indonesian Under-19 national team kept trying to lock up Timor Leste's defense. The visitors themselves try to threaten through a counterattack. In the 15th minute, Paulo Domingos Freitas kicks off. But Freitas' kick was off target. The U-19 Indonesian National Team's attempt to storm East Timor's defense was also not easy. Timor Leste made a tight guard on the players who brought the ball. In the 22nd minute, the collaboration between Bagus Kahfi and Bagas Kaffa ended in Bagas cross. But Bagas's cross was not welcomed by other Indonesian players. A minute later, Freitas escaped the offside trap. Seeing this, goalkeeper Ernando Ari moved quickly and caught the ball. Ernando had collided with Freitas who slipped. In the 29th minute the Indonesian National Team U-19 got a free kick because Salman Alfarid was dropped in front of the penalty box. Rizky Ridho fired a horizontal kick which was successfully pushed over by Junildo Manuel Pereira. The wild ball was immediately greeted by the hard kick of Theo Fillo Numberi but again thwarted by Pereira. In the final 10 minutes of the first half, Indonesia's efforts to suppress Timor Leste continued to be intensively carried out. Although the flow of the attack was smoother, the final settlement of Sutan Zico and his friends was not satisfactory. In the 40th minute, Zico failed to maximize the long bait released by Salman. Zico's shot bounced far above the goal. In the 45th minute, the turn of the Bagus kick failed to lead to the second goal because the ball was thinly spread to the right of the goal. The first round ended with a score of 1-0 for the Indonesia U-19 national team. The composition of the Indonesian U-19 national team players: Ernando Ari Sutaryadi; Amiruddin Bagas Kaffa, Rizky Ridho, Alfeandra Dewangga, M Salman Alfarid; Theo Fillo Numberi, David Maulana, Beckham Putra; Amiruddin Bagus Kahfi, Sutan Zico, M Fajar Fathur Rahman. Timor Leste: Junildo Manuel Pereira; Orcelio Nobelito Moises, Gumario Da Silva Moreira, Nelson Pinto Dos Reis; Jaimito Antonio Soares, Jhon Frith Ornai Liu, Paulo Domingos Freitas, Mouzinho De Lima, Expedito Soares Da Conceicao; Elias Joao Mesquita, Osorio Angelo Da Cos. (ptr)
